siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Company in a Box is a GPT-3 powered tool that creates compelling landing pages for your startup idea in seconds. Vet more ideas, focus on the ones that stick, and start collecting leads! Coming soon: deploy ads & plug in your own Typeform waitlist.
blogPost.body: Company in a Box is a GPT-3 powered tool that creates compelling landing pages for your startup idea in seconds. Vet more ideas, focus on the ones that stick, and start collecting leads! Coming soon: deploy ads & plug in your own Typeform waitlist.
blogPost.title: Company in a Box - Startup idea to leads in one click with GPT-3
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 盒子里的公司是一个GPT-3驱动的工具，它可以在几秒钟内为你的创业想法创建引人注目的登录页面。审查更多的想法，专注于那些坚持的想法，并开始收集线索！即将推出：部署广告并插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 借助GPT-3，一键即可获得潜在客户的创业想法

localize.description: 盒子裏的公司是一個GPT-3驅動的工具，它可以在幾秒鐘內爲你的創業想法創建引人注目的登錄頁面。審查更多的想法，專注於那些堅持的想法，並開始收集線索！即將推出：部署廣告並插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 藉助GPT-3，一鍵即可獲得潛在客戶的創業想法

previous.excerpt: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
previous.title: Makeena - Making better products affordable no matter where you shop.

localize.description: Makeena奖励购买“更好”的消费者，同时为品牌提供实时的购物者洞察力。我们的应用程序捕获所有收据数据，以及其他活动，而我们的仪表板则允许品牌访问这些数据，以推动重复购买行为。
localize.tagline: 无论你在哪里购物，都能买得起更好的产品。

localize.description: Makeena獎勵購買“更好”的消費者，同時爲品牌提供實時的購物者洞察力。我們的應用程序捕獲所有收據數據，以及其他活動，而我們的儀表板則允許品牌訪問這些數據，以推動重複購買行爲。
localize.tagline: 無論你在哪裏購物，都能買得起更好的產品。

next.excerpt: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.
next.title: Axel - Powerful rituals to drive your team to success.

localize.description: Axel是一个虚拟助手，帮助您在团队中培养透明和主人翁的文化。只需单击几下，即可从模板设置正确的1：1和每周签到。我们的秘诀：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推动您的团队走向成功的强大仪式。

localize.description: Axel是一個虛擬助手，幫助您在團隊中培養透明和主人翁的文化。只需單擊幾下，即可從模板設置正確的1：1和每週簽到。我們的祕訣：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推動您的團隊走向成功的強大儀式。
